triplets: Green edible seed pod vegetable from the mallow family
Soups, stews, stir-fries, fried dishes, and as a thickening agent
Fibrous pod, seeds, and mucilaginous interior
Green when fresh, can turn brown when cooked or dried
Okra plant, tropical and subtropical vegetable gardens
Farmers and agricultural producers in warm climates
Fresh: about a week refrigerated; can be frozen or dried
